name: Dinosaur Fossil Hunter
description:
GAME WORLD:
Hit the road to search for fossils of extinct spieces, that once ruled the Earth. Travel through hostile lands and discover mysteries of depths of the desert. Use your track to switch between sites.
GAMEPLAY:
Collecting fossils is not that easy. Escpecially if you have to dig it by yourself. You think, all you have to do is to find right area? You are wrong - it's just a beggining. Use your track, dynamite and flair, to get rid of obstacles. Using shovel, pickaxe and chivel - dig bones. But... watch out! It's very fragile.
This equipment will help you with hard journey to build your little dinosaur empire:
- Track - which will be your main conveyance
- Radar - which is necessary to localise fossil
- Tablet - with dinosaur data
- Various tools - which will allow you to dig through thick layers of rock
- Explosive materials - we are sure, that you know what for
Become paleontologist and make dinosaurs rule the Earth again.
